profile.description:
Hello my name is Ivan, I am passionate about technology, film and travel, I studied computer science. I consider myself a multifaceted person, I have done design, web development, digital marketing, photography and video editing or at least I try.üòÑ

Belowüëáüëáyou can find out a bit more about what I have been working on.

experience.first-job-description: Management, SEO audits for web and RRSS with SEMRUSH, Ahref and Google Analytics. Website migration. Administration of domains and hosting.
experience.second-job-description: I teach tricks, tips and analysis of products that help you in your day to day life, all in the form of videos for YouTube.
experience.last-job-description:
Computer maintenance of the ABC (Automated Border Control) equipment used by the National Police Force for the identification of persons at border entry and exit control.

Assembly, installation, diagnosis and maintenance of computer equipment and biometric readers, cloning/restoration and backups.

hobbies.hobbie-text: I am a fan of outdoor and indoor cinema and series, so much so that I have a projector to have a better experience.
hobbies.hobbie-text2: I love travelling, getting to know new cultures, customs, languages, food, etc.

projects.text-blog: Website I use to write articles about technology, product reviews, applications, news, etc. I also show the equipment I use for work, leisure and video.
projects.text-canalyt: I teach tricks, tips and analysis of products that help you in your day to day life, I do all this in the form of videos for YouTube, taking the production and editing of photography and video, I create content on social networks, using online marketing strategies.
projects.text-portfolio: Portfolio with a different design from this one.
projects.text-recipes: This is a website I made to practice with CSS Flex.
projects.text-frontstore: I made this website to practice with CSS Grid.
projects.text-banner: I made this banner using Adobe Protoshop, to humanise my channel more, before I had a logo and to show from the beginning who is behind the camera.
projects.title-oldbanner: Old banner of my YouTube channel
projects.text-oldbanner: I made it using Adobe Protoshop, this was one of the first covers I made, this banner is no longer available.
projects.text-miniatures: Creation of thumbnails for the YouTube videos that I have been uploading to my channel. I have applied my knowledge in design and digital marketing to make thumbnails as attractive as possible.
projects.text-photomontage: Creation of a photomontage, I have always liked doing photo retouching and I wanted to represent the interaction we have with social networks.
projects.text-photomontage2: Creation of a photomontage, I'm a big fan of ice cream and trying with a photo I had, this came out and the truth is that it hasn't turned out bad at all üòÑ.
